topic.title: Topic
topic.description: Any valid topic name addressing a single data-point

qos.title: QoS
qos.description: Quality of service (QOS) level for this subscription at the external MQTT broker. Watch out: If the internal message forwarding should continue with the same non-zero QOS level, this must additionally be configured by specifiying the same qos value also in the general Endpoint properties (one level higher in the commissioning file), and in the subscribe and publish side of each involved Mapping, too.

retain.title: Retain
retain.description: Whether the last message should be retained (last-value-cached) on the broker (default: false)

burstInterval.title: Burst interval
burstInterval.description: Interval in ms during which incoming data-point values are aggregated (default: 0 = no aggregation)

nl.title: No Local
nl.description: Controls whether a message should be forwarded to a connection with a ClientID equal to the ClientID of the publishing connection

rap.title: Retain as Published
rap.description: Controls whether a message with the retain flag set to true maintains the flag when being forwarded

rh.title: Retain Handling
rh.description: Controls whether retained messages are sent when subscription is established

correlationData.title: Correlation Data
correlationData.description: The Correlation Data is used by the sender of the Request Message to identify which request the Response Message is for when it is received

contentType.title: Subscription Identifier
contentType.description: String describing the content of the Application Message

messageExpiryInterval.title: Message Expiry Interval
messageExpiryInterval.description: Lifetime in seconds of the Application Message

payloadFormatIndicator.title: Payload Format Indicator
payloadFormatIndicator.description: Indicates whether the payload is UTF-8 encoded or not

responseTopic.title: Response Topic
responseTopic.description: String which is used as the Topic Name for a response message in a request/response context

subscriptionIdentifier.title: Subscription Identifier
subscriptionIdentifier.description: Represents the identifier of the subscription

topicAlias.title: Topic Alias
topicAlias.description: A Topic Alias is an integer value that is used to identify the Topic instead of using the Topic Name. This reduces the size of the PUBLISH packet
